Oct. 31, 1982 D Pontins Youth Brass Band Championships (Section A)
Pontins Youth Contest (Section A) 90 Set Test and Own Choice Pontins pontins-youth-contest
West Sou' West
Pontins Holiday Camp, Prestatyn, Denbighshire, Wales, UK Bands played West Sou' West by Denzil Stephens plus an own choice, maximum time 8 mins 30 seconds.
Feb. 25, 2012, 11:02 p.m. March 2, 2012, 4:50 p.m.

3 Metropolitan Borough of Wigan School J. Woodward
